channel.title: Future Beats Show
channel.description: A blend of deep futuristic beats and grooves. Beats from the past and here and now that still sound fresh. Its all about the fusion of sound! The podcast is mainly recodings of the biweekly show on weds nights at 9pm on radio.myhouse-yourhouse.net. Also occassion special mixes when I have time!
channel.itunes:subtitle: All types of wonkiness, crispy and broken beats!
channel.itunes:author: Cyclonix
channel.itunes:summary: A blend of deep futuristic beats and grooves. Beats from the past and here and now that still sound fresh. Its all about the fusion of sound! The podcast is mainly recodings of the biweekly show on weds nights at 9pm on radio.myhouse-yourhouse.net. Also occassion special mixes when I have time!

item.title: Future Beats Show - 9th May 2012 - Back to BRUK vinyl selection
item.description: 1) Hopper - Welcome to this world [2000 Black] 2) Quango - God inside [People] 3) Champion Soul - Wha Cha Got (Afronaught remix) [Main squeeze] 4) Jonny Miller - Rise [Phuture Lounge] 5) Likwid Biskit - Herbs & Spices (original mix) [Coop] 6) Nu-groove - Let it Ride[Pure Filth] 7) Afropsychopaths - New way (IGs NSM flex) [Sunshine Enterprise] 8) 2 banks of 4 - Go (4 hero/2000 black remix) [Sonar Kolletiv] 9) Volcov & Paradox - Soulbreeze (Isoul8 edit) [Rush hour] 10) Colonel Red - U gimme that feelin (John Beltram rework) [People] 11) Izzi Dunn - Out of My hands [Kaidi Tatham remix] [Fireworx]

item.title: Future Beats Show 28.3.12
item.description: 1990S & 2000-2009 vinyl selection on this show. 1) Shut Up and Dance - The art of moving butts [Shut up and Dance] 2) Chameleon - Reshuffle [Botchit Breaks] 3) John Arnold - Rough [Ubiquity] 4) Likwid Biskit - Find Peace Within [People] 5) Gum Drop - Sinking Feeling (Instrumental)[Altered Vibes] 6) Hint - One Woman Army (Mr Beatnick Slow Jack Remix) [Ubiquity] 7) Freedom Soundz -Hero [Neroli] 8) Uschi Classen - Meditative Flow[Earth Project] 9) Small Arms Fiya And Pete Simpson - All Over [Caught Out There Music] 10) Zoltar - Wah Wah [Story Of An Age] 11)Rednose Distrikt - N.Y.Boom (Domu's N.Y.Beats) [Rush Hour] 12) Ammon Contact - Zato Ichi [Plug Research] 13) Furry Phreaks with Terra Deva– All Over The World (Charles Webster Dub) [Miso]

item.title: Future Beats Show - 18.1.12 - Good Looking Records Special
item.description: One hour show featuring a selection of my records from Good Looking Records and its sub-labels: Cadien - Bud [Cookin] The Invisible Man - Spiritual Awareness [Looking Good] Blame - Centuries [Good Looking] Artemis - Sun Stars [Good Looking] Solaris - Afro Funk [Cookin] Big Bud - Stone Groover [Good Looking] Blu Mar Ten [720 Degrees] Sebu - Connected [Good Looking] Pariah - Confessions [Good Looking] Nookie - Pet Sounds [Good Looking] Voodoo Bull - Native Soul [Cookin] Makato feat Cleveland Watkiss (Kyoto Jazz Remix) [Good Looking]

item.title: Future Beats Show 23.11.11 - Mark de Clive Lowe Special pt 1
item.description: Tribute to Mark de Clive Lowe. Selection of tracks from the last 10 years including from his new album Renegades on Tru Thoughts Records. 1) Mark de Clive Lowe - Alabi Prelude (Renegades album) [Tru Thoughts] 2) Mark de Clive Lowe - Better days (Unit 46 edit) [People] 3) Mark de Clive Lowe - Relax unwind (Afrojas Reconstruction [Muthas Of Invention] 4) Mark de Clive Lowe - Get Started featuring Omar and Sheila E (Renegades album) [Tru Thoughts] 5)Dub Basement - Thrill Seekers [Bitasweet] 6) Mark de Clive Lowe - Twilight featuring Lady Alma [Especial] 7) Mark de Clive Lowe & Dego - Under Orders featuring Tawiah (Renegades album)[Tru Thoughts] 8) Tonkatsu - Insiders [Laws of Motion] 9) Mark de Clive Lowe - Travelling featuring Capitol A & Bembe Segue [Antipodean] 10)Mark de Clive Lowe - Everything featuring Ovasoul 7 [Tru Thoughts] 11) Mark de Clive Lowe - Reintroducing [Jazz Refreshed] 12) Mark de Clive Lowe presents Sy Smith - Truth (Mark de Clive Lowe remix) [Strictly Rhythum] 13) Chico Hamilton - El Toro (Mark de Clive Lowe remix) [Impulse!]
item.dc:creator: Cyclonix

Tribute to Mark de Clive Lowe. Selection of tracks from the last 10 years including from his new album Renegades on Tru Thoughts Records.

Capitol A [Sonar kollectiv] 3) Madlib - Steppin into tomorrow [Blue Note] 4) Recloose - Electric Sunshine [Rush Hour] 5) Waiwan - Changes (Fours Mix) [Earth Project] 6) Simon Grey - Galactica Suite (Domu remix) [Papa] 7) Stateless - Hool Hool (Yukihiro Fukutomi Remix) [Freerange] 8) Floating Points - Faruxz [Eglo] 9) Funkineven - xxx [Eglo] 10) DJ Pierre - Box Energy [Serious] 11) Dr Derelict - That Shits Wild [Serious] 12) Another track I didn't write down?
